subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: To compete in the increasingly rugged American League, the Royals need high-impact players at low cost. Their shining example is Eric Hosmer, 22, who hit .293 last season.
snippet: To compete in the increasingly rugged American League, the Royals need high-impact players at low cost. Their shining example is Eric Hosmer, 22, who hit .293 last season.
